body:
Hello, I'm xToby from Lisbon, Portugal.

Some of you saw in the news that a huge disaster is taking over of portugal:
Massive fires are taking over the houses, trees, mountains....

I went to Alvarenga, a place in portugal that is 10km. from a huge fire ( in the first day, there was no fire...) and everytime I wake up, a huge cloud of fire was surrounding the house.

In Funchal, island of Madeira, a big fire is taking over the island.
Historic monuments, malls, houses, forests burned and people are sleeping in the beach in the o
pposite side where the fire is.

So I'm here to tell you that Portugal needs help. As a really religious person, I beg you all too take a minute of your lifes praying for all the portugueses citzens that lost their houses... or their lifes.

http://imgur.com/a/kTsVI
body_tagged:
Hello, I'm xToby from Lisbon, Portugal.

Some of you saw in the news that a huge disaster is taking over of portugal:
Massive fires are taking over the houses, trees, mountains....

I went to Alvarenga, a place in portugal that is 10km. from a huge fire ( in the first day, there was no fire...) and everytime I wake up, a huge cloud of fire was surrounding the house.

In Funchal, island of Madeira, a big fire is taking over the island.
Historic monuments, malls, houses, forests burned and people are sleeping in the beach in the o
pposite side where the fire is.

So I'm here to tell you that Portugal needs help. As a really religious person, I beg you all too take a minute of your lifes praying for all the portugueses citzens that lost their houses... or their lifes.

http://imgur.com/a/kTsVI
title: Please, Pray for Portugal.

replies.body:
Wish Portugal good luck, but they'll make it. Just like Canada did a few months ago
Few months ago, Fort Mcmurray fire in Canada. Started May 1st, still going but under control. Has until now burnt around 600 000 hectares, perimeter of 1000km.
Again good luck, but don't scare yourself too much, it'll be fine.

Again good luck, but don't scare yourself too much, it'll be fine.

The house were I was ( I could see a huge fire from that ) is now 25-50m from fire, all my friends left earlier because of that, there's firefighters everywhere. It's 4:45 rn and I can't sleep because I've been trying to talk with them all night. 
Thanks everyone for the affect, it means alot for me. <3
